name: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER
description: Battle as a team of 4 to compete against other teams online! Graphically, SHINOBI STRIKER is also built from the ground up in a completely new graphic style. Lead your team and fight online to see who the best ninjas are!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 40 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB  / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660  2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 40 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
